definition: to move (i.e. relocate oneself)/to move (sth relatively heavy or bulky)/to shift/to copy indiscriminately
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: The Mountains would be a great place for the company retreat.
sentences.chinese: 这座山会是个很棒的公司搬迁地址。

sentences.english: The government has plans to move Dachang to higher ground.
sentences.chinese: 政府考虑将大昌古镇整体搬迁到高地。

sentences.english: Mr. Kirkland is determined to sell before he moves.
sentences.chinese: 卡卡兰德决定在他搬迁之前出售房子。

sentences.english: The Petersons considered moving to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 比德森一家考虑搬迁到澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Xu told the protestors that the relocation was still in the planning stages.
sentences.chinese: 徐省长告诉上访者说该搬迁方案尚在计划阶段。

sentences.english: We packed all the things before we moved.
sentences.chinese: 我们在搬迁前把所有的东西都捆好了。

sentences.english: She transferred and moved her personal belongings to six different store locations.
sentences.chinese: 她先后搬迁个人财物到六个不同的工作场所。

sentences.english: To make way for all this, three villages and thousands of villagers had to be moved.
sentences.chinese: 建这些路的时候，搬迁了三哥村子和数千的村民。

sentences.english: Marini says that choosing to relocate to Silicon Valley was essential to Logitech's success.
sentences.chinese: 马尼尼说搬迁至硅谷是罗技成功的关键。

sentences.english: This family of 12 decided to move to Kathmandu.
sentences.chinese: 准备搬迁到加德满都的12口之家。

sentences.english: Regularly uprooting from one place to another since childhood, currently living in Beijing, China.
sentences.chinese: 自小就到处搬迁，目前暂居中国北京。

sentences.english: But deciding to relocate based on statistics is not advisable.
sentences.chinese: 但是根据这些统计数据去搬迁并非明智之举。

sentences.english: The chassis uses the self-propelled – like vehicle to carry, the complete bikes relocation, the migration is good .
sentences.chinese: 底盘采用自走式车载形式，整车搬迁，运移性好。

sentences.english: The new volunteers camp has finally finished all the relocation work.
sentences.chinese: 志愿营新营地终于搬迁完毕。

sentences.english: It is the third move of Sandu Cultural Media since it founded.
sentences.chinese: 本次是三度文化传媒机构创立以来第三次搬迁。

sentences.english: Lived in Riverside County manor, L. A… But I just moved several days ago.
sentences.chinese: 生长在罗省河畔县的一家庄园里，不过我刚刚搬迁了。

definition: to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
to tear down/to demolish/to dismantle/to remove
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/to get into bed/placement
to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
